thread.title: Dodgers pick Kershaw to start on 3 days' rest in Game 4
thread.title_full: Dodgers pick Kershaw to start on 3 days' rest in Game 4

author: MIKE FITZPATRICK
title: Dodgers pick Kershaw to start on 3 days' rest in Game 4
text:
Frank Franklin II Dodgers pick Kershaw to start on 3 days' rest in Game 4 
Los Angeles Dodgers starting pitcher Clayton Kershaw speaks during a news conference before Game 3 of baseball’s National League Division Series, Monday, Oct. 12, 2015, at CitiField in New York. (AP Photo/Frank Franklin II) Gregory Bull Dodgers pick Kershaw to start on 3 days' rest in Game 4 
Los Angeles Dodgers starting pitcher Clayton Kershaw throws against the New York Mets during the first inning in Game 1 of baseball's National League Division Series, Friday, Oct. 9, 2015 in Los Angeles. (AP Photo/Gregory Bull) Gregory Bull Dodgers pick Kershaw to start on 3 days' rest in Game 4 
Los Angeles Dodgers starting pitcher Clayton Kershaw reacts after walking New York Mets' Ruben Tejada during the seventh inning in Game 1 of baseball's National League Division Series, Friday, Oct. 9, 2015 in Los Angeles. (AP Photo/Gregory Bull) Kathy Willens Dodgers pick Kershaw to start on 3 days' rest in Game 4 
Los Angeles Dodgers pitcher Clayton Kershaw catches for fellow pitcher Brett Anderson during a workout Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015, in preparation for Monday's NLDS baseball game against the New York Mets at CitiField in New York. (AP Photo/Kathy Willens) Kathy Willens Dodgers pick Kershaw to start on 3 days' rest in Game 4 
Los Angeles Dodgers starting pitcher Clayton Kershaw throws on the field before taking a bullpen session on a NLDS workout day, Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015, at CitiField in New York. (AP Photo/Kathy Willens) Frank Franklin II Dodgers pick Kershaw to start on 3 days' rest in Game 4 
Los Angeles Dodgers starting pitcher Clayton Kershaw speaks during a news conference before Game 3 of baseball’s National League Division Series, Monday, Oct. 12, 2015, at CitiField in New York. (AP Photo/Frank Franklin II) Frank Franklin II Dodgers pick Kershaw to start on 3 days' rest in Game 4 
Los Angeles Dodgers starting pitcher Clayton Kershaw listens to a question during a news conference before Game 3 of baseball’s National League Division Series against the New York Mets, Monday, Oct. 12, 2015, at CitiField in New York. (AP Photo/Frank Franklin II) Posted: Monday, October 12, 2015 4:13 pm | Updated: 5:00 pm, Mon Oct 12, 2015. Dodgers pick Kershaw to start on 3 days' rest in Game 4 Associated Press | 
NEW YORK (AP) — Clayton Kershaw's next chance to end his playoff skid will come on short rest. 
With only three days between outings, Kershaw is scheduled to start for the Los Angeles Dodgers in Game 4 of their NL Division Series against the New York Mets. The reigning NL MVP and three-time Cy Young Award winner was chosen Monday over fellow left-hander Alex Wood. Subscription Required An online service is needed to view this article in its entirety.
